title: I Can't Identify This Awesome Font
content:
The documentary Alien Planet uses a very cool font to identify speakers. It shows the font a lot right after the video starts, available [here on YouTube](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822001441/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3DBNLfNe12BKE). I would appreciate some help identifying it.

Thanks,

Forrest
author: fctaylor25

comments.content: Looks to me like [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822001441/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/handel-gothic/). Is that the one you mean?
